ReportText: EXAM: CHEST RADIOGRAPHY EXAM DATE: 03/02/2019 07:11 PM. CLINICAL HISTORY: Cough, fever. COMPARISON: None. TECHNIQUE: 2 views. FINDINGS: Lungs/Pleura: There is patchy perihilar opacity. No pleural effusion. No pneumothorax. Normal volumes. Mediastinum: Heart and mediastinal contours are unremarkable. Other: No acute osseous abnormality. IMPRESSION: Patchy perihilar opacity. This may represent viral infection or reactive airway disease.
